entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of wet snow mixed with rain changing to rain this morning. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow and ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
